metadata.title: Arctic CTD Data Collated under ESDIM Data Rescue

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description: CTD:  High resolution vertical profiles of conductivity, temperature, and pressure.  Additional sensors may include dissolved oxygen or other biological/chemical sensors (nephelometers, flurometers).
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To collect, record and preserve high resolution vertical profiles of conductivity, temperature, and depth (CTD).

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned

Access constraints: None.

Use constraints: None.

Distribution liability: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system.
